body_html: @ppwwyyxx Thanks for your comments. I agree that float16 will not make a difference for computing performance. The issue reported here is caused by that the current API does not support the float16 data type yet, but some use cases may need to handle float16 data. Considering this, do you think it will be useful for users? What do you think of this? @angersson @raghavgurbaxani
